title: Tirra Lirra by the river [a discussion]
creator_credit: David Zweck, Daryl Wayland and Country Education Project, Box Hill School of TAFE
brief_description: Jocelyn Terry, Elaine Barry and Greg Kratzman discuss Jessica Anderson novel, which is set in Brisbane. Explores the text’s connection with Tennyson’s poem; Nora’s exploration of her own experience; the role of masks and the place of minor characters.
creator_credit_for_label: David Zweck, Daryl Wayland and Country Education Project, Box Hill School of TAFE
